sentences: Poplauljate elu miinuspoole moodustavad tüütud fännid ja paparatsod.
Paparatso püüdis pildistada ametist lahkuvat ministrit.
translation: photographer who chases celebrities for photos
context: The word 'pilte' appears to be part of the compound word 'paparatsod' which refers to paparazzi - photographers who chase celebrities and public figures to take their photos, often without permission. In these example sentences, it's used in plural form to refer to paparazzi photographers as a group.
